data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the county of Xiangxi Tujia and Miao.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Xiangxi Tujia and Miao, Hunan, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao to agree with you and with one another.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 3,314,142, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Xiangxi Tujia and Miao.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Ghao-Xong, Eastern people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Ghao-Xong, Eastern people know you.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao, Hunan, China a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao, Hunan, China so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.focus_label: Xiangxi Tujia and Miao, Hunan, China

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Xiangxi Tujia and Miao, Hunan, China.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,
